TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NonEventAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Identifies a method that is not generating an event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks By default, all instance methods in a class that subclasses `code:EventSource` and that return `void` are assumed to be methods that generate an event. This default can be overridden by applying the NonEventAttribute attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
